quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind.
To love is to believe, to hope, to know.
If there were nobody who loved, the sun would be extinguished.
In dreams and in love there are no impossibilities.
In true love it is the soul that envelops the body.
One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is Love.
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
Love grants in a moment what toil can hardly achieve in an age.
There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
Love is space and time measured with the heart.
Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
We are asleep until we fall in love!
Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
Love must be as much a light as it is a flame.
In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.
I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.
Love is a gift of one's inner most soul to another so both can be whole.
Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
For small creatures such as we, the vastness is bearable only through love.
If I know what love is, it is because of you.
Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
There is no charm equal to tenderness of the heart.
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
The more I wonder, the more I love.
To be seen in this life, truly observed without judgment, is what it feels like to be loved.
Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive.
All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
